title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses the Ok button, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This issue occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
EB: The expected behavior of the 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3 is not mentioned.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the settings menu
3. Select the 'Output Location' option
4. Set the output location to a specific folder
5. Navigate back to the settings menu
6. Select the 'Classpath' option
7. Set the classpath to some value
8. Press the Ok button
9. Observe the error message
